label: neonatal cerebellar ataxia, GRM1-related, dog
definition: Any cerebellar ataxia that occurs dogs due to a mutation in the GRM1 gene.

label: glycogen storage disease IV, dog
definition: Any glycogen storage disease that occurs in dogs due to a glycogen branching enzyme (GBE) deficiency.

label: glycogen storage disease IV, domestic cat
definition: Any glycogen storage disease that occurs in cats due to a mutation in the GBE1 gene.

label: glycogen storage disease IV, horse
definition: Any glycogen storage disease that occurs in horses due to a mutation in the GBE1 gene.

label: fasting unconjugated hyperbilirubinemia, Bolivian squirrel monkey
definition: Any unconjugated hyperbilirubinemia due to an increase in the bilirubin turnover/production rate and/or decreased hepatic conjugation during fasting that occurs in Bolivian squirrel monkey.

label: unconjugated hyperbilirubinemia, horse
definition: Unconjugated hyperbilirubinemia that occurs in horses.

label: conjugated hyperbilirubinemia, sheep
definition: A liver disorder characterized by chronic conjugated hyperbilirubinemia and gross dark brown to black discoloration of the liver that occurs in sheep.

label: conjugated hyperbilirubinemia, golden lion tamarin
definition: A liver disorder characterized by chronic conjugated hyperbilirubinemia and abundant intrahepatic pigment in a centrilobular and midzonal distribution that occurs in golden lion tamarins.

label: intestinal cobalamin (vitamin B12) malabsorption, AMN-related, dog
definition: Intestinal cobalamin (vitamin B12) malabsorption that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the AMN gene.

label: membranoproliferative glomerulonephritis, CFH-related, pig
definition: Form of glomerulonephritis that occurs in pigs, is characterized by glomerular hypercellularity and thickening of the glomerular capillary walls and glomerular basement membrane due to large amounts of dense deposits, and is caused by an absence of omplement regulator factor H.

label: mesangiocapillary glomerulonephritis, type I, sheep
definition: A form of glomerulonephritis that occurs in sheep and is characterized by thickening of glomerular capillary basement membranes, proliferation of mesangial cells, and peri-glomerular fibrosis and associated with C3 deficiency.

label: microphthalmia-4, chicken
definition: Inherited microphthalmia that occurs in female chickens.

label: mucopolysaccharidosis I, dog
definition: Any lysosomal storage disorder that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the IDUA gene.

label: mucopolysaccharidosis I, domestic cat
definition: Any lysosomal storage disorder that occurs in cats due to a mutation in the IDUA gene.

label: nephritis, COL4A5-related, dog
definition: Nephritis that occurs in male dogs due to a mutation in the COL4A5 gene.

label: autosomal dominant nephritis, dog
definition: Autosomal dominant form of nephritis that occurs in dogs.

label: mucolipidosis, GNPTAB-related, domestic cat
definition: Mucolipidosis that occurs in cats due to a mutation in the GNPTAB gene.

label: mucopolysaccharidosis II, Kaka
definition: Any lysosomal storage disorder characterized by deficient iduronate-2-sulfatase (IDS) activity that occurs in kakas.

label: mucopolysaccharidosis II, dog
definition: Any lysosomal storage disorder characterized by deficient iduronate-2-sulfatase (IDS) activity that occurs in dogs.

label: hereditary footpad hyperkeratosis, FAM83G-related, dog
definition: An orthokeratotic palmoplantar hyperkeratosis leading to thickened and hardened footpads that occurs in dogs starting at an age of 18 to 24 weeks of age due to a mutation in the FAM83G gene.

label: mucopolysaccharidosis IIIB, emu
definition: Any lysosomal storage disorder that occurs in emu due to a mutation in the NAGLU gene.

label: mucopolysaccharidosis IIIB, dog
definition: Any lysosomal storage disorder that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the NAGLU gene.

label: mucopolysaccharidosis IIIB, pig
definition: Any lysosomal storage disorder that occurs in pigs due to a mutation in the NAGLU gene created by genetic engineering or gene editing.

label: mucopolysaccharidosis IIIB, cattle
definition: Any lysosomal storage disorder that occurs in cattle due to a mutation in the NAGLU gene.

label: canine multiple system degeneration, SERAC1-related, dog
definition: A progressive hereditary neurodegenerative disorder that occurs in dogs and is characterized by neuronal degeneration and loss in the cerebellum, olivary nuclei, substantia nigra, and caudate nuclei due to a mutation in the SERAC1 gene.

label: melanoma-bearing Libechov minipig, pig
definition: Hereditary melanoma that occurs in melanoma-bearing Libechov minipipgs due to selective breeding for the purpose of creating a swine model of hereditary metastatic melanoma.

label: lysosomal storage disease, ARSG related, dog
definition: Any lysosomal storage disease that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the ARSG gene.

label: immunodeficiency syndrome, SLC5A3-related, horse
definition: Immunodeficiency characterized by B-lymphocyte lymphopenia and progressive anemia that occurs in horses due to a mutation in the SLC5A3 gene.

label: ichthyosis, PNPLA1-related, dog
definition: Ichthyosis that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the PNPLA1 gene.

label: muscular dystrophy with reduced β-sarcoglycan, domestic cat
definition: Any muscular dystrophy associated with β-sarcoglycan deficiency that occurs in cats.

label: junctional epidermolysis bullosa, LAMA3-related, dog
definition: Junctional epidermolysis bullosa that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the LAMA3 gene.

label: junctional epidermolysis bullosa, LAMA3-related, horse
definition: Junctional epidermolysis bullosa that occurs in horses due to a mutation in the LAMA3 gene.

label: junctional epidermolysis bullosa, LAMA3-related, cattle
definition: Junctional epidermolysis bullosa that occurs in cattle due to a mutation in the LAMA3 gene.

label: junctional epidermolysis bullosa, LAMC2-related, horse
definition: Junctional epidermolysis bullosa that occurs in horses due to a mutation in the LAMC2 gene.

label: junctional epidermolysis bullosa, LAMC2-related, cattle
definition: Junctional epidermolysis bullosa that occurs in cattle due to a mutation in the LAMC2 gene.

label: junctional epidermolysis bullosa, LAMC2-related, sheep
definition: Junctional epidermolysis bullosa that occurs in sheep due to a mutation in the LAMC2 gene.

label: hemifacial microsomia, domestic cat
definition: Any congenital malformation syndrome presenting with unilateral craniofacial abnormalities that occurs in cats.

label: intestinal cobalamin (vitamin B12) malabsorption, CUBN-related, dog
definition: Intestinal cobalamin (vitamin B12) malabsorption that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the CUBN gene.

label: junctional epidermolysis bullosa, ITGB4-related, cattle
definition: Junctional epidermolysis bullosa that occurs in cattle due to a mutation in the ITGB4 gene.

label: junctional epidermolysis bullosa, ITGB4-related, sheep
definition: Junctional epidermolysis bullosa that occurs in sheep due to a mutation in the ITGB4 gene.

label: atherosclerosis, APOE-related, rabbit
definition: Atherosclerosis that occurs in rabbits due to a mutation in the APOE gene created by genetic engineering or gene editing.

label: ichthyosis, ASPRV1-related, dog
definition: Ichthyosis that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the ASPRV1 gene.

label: hypotrichosis, KRT71-related, cattle
definition: Congenital hypotrichosis that occurs in cattle due to a mutation in the KRT71 gene.

label: Leigh syndrome, SURF1-related, pig
definition: A mitochondrial disease characterized by central nervous system development delay that occurs in pigs due to a mutation in the SURF1 gene created by genetic engineering or gene editing.

label: hereditary nonpolyposis colorectal cancer, MSH6-related, rhesus monkey
definition: Tumors at the ileocecal junction, cecum and proximal colon that occur in rhesus macaques due to a germline mutation in the MSH6 gene.

label: hypertrophic cardiomyopathy, MYH7-related, domestic cat
definition: Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy that occurs in cats due to a mutation in the MYH7 gene.

label: hypertrophic cardiomyopathy, MYH7-related, pig
definition: Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy that occurs in pigs due to a mutation in the MYH7 gene.

label: hypertrophic cardiomyopathy, MYH7-related, rabbit
definition: Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy that occurs in rabbits due to a mutation in the MYH7 gene.

label: leukodystrophy, TSEN54-related, dog
definition: Leukodystrophy that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the TSEN54 gene.

label: hypogonadotropic hypogonadism, TAC3-related, domestic cat
definition: Hypogonadism characterized by dysfunctional GnRH release leading to low blood testosterone and pituitary hormone levels and impaired testicular function that occurs in cats due to a mutation in the TAC3 gene.

label: laryngeal paralysis, RAPGEF6-related, dog
definition: Laryngeal paralysis that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the RAPGEF6 gene.

label: lipid malabsorption, ACSL5-related, dog
definition: An inborn error of lipid metabolism characterized by stunted postnatal growth, steatorrhea, abdominal distension and wiry coat that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the ACSL5 gene.

label: hypotrichosis, HR-related, domestic cat
definition: Congenital hypotrichosis that occurs in cats due to a mutation in the HR gene.

label: hypotrichosis, HR-related, pig
definition: Congenital hypotrichosis that occurs in pigs due to a mutation in the HR gene created by genetic engineering or gene editing.

label: hypotrichosis, HR-related, sheep
definition: Congenital hypotrichosis that occurs in sheep due to a mutation in the HR gene.

label: hypotrichosis, HEPHL1-related, cattle
definition: Congenital hypotrichosis that occurs in cattle due to a mutation in the HEPHL1 gene.

label: congenital myopathy, SPTBN4-related, pig
definition: Any congenital myopathy that occurs in pigs due to a mutation in the SPTBN4 gene.

label: ichthyosis, ABCA12-related, pig
definition: Ichthyosis that occurs in pigs due to a mutation in the ABCA12 gene.

label: ichthyosis, ABCA12-related, cattle
definition: Ichthyosis that occurs in cattle due to a mutation in the ABCA12 gene.

label: muscular dystrophy, ANO5-related, rabbit
definition: Any muscular dystrophy that occurs in rabbits due to a mutation in the ANO5 gene created by genetic engineering or gene editing.

label: ichthyosis, DSP-related, cattle
definition: Ichthyosis that occurs in cattle due to a mutation in the DSP gene.

label: junctional epidermolysis bullosa, LAMB3-related, dog
definition: Junctional epidermolysis bullosa that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the LAMB3 gene.

label: muscular dystrophy, TNNT1-related, sheep
definition: Any muscular dystrophy that occurs in sheep due to a mutation in the TNNT1 gene.

label: laryngeal paralysis and polyneuropathy, CNTNAP1-related, dog
definition: Laryngeal paralysis with variable dysphagia, dysphonia, high-stepping and uncoordinated gait, exercise intolerance, stumbling and tripping, and limb muscle atrophy that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the CNTNAP1 gene.

label: limb-girdle muscular dystrophy, SGCA-related, dog
definition: Any muscular dystrophy that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the SGCA gene.

label: hypertrophic cardiomyopathy, ALMS1-related, domestic cat
definition: Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy that occurs in cats due to a mutation in the ALMS1 gene.

label: hypercholesterolemia, PCSK9-related, rabbit
definition: Hypercholesterolemia that occurs in rabbits due to a mutation in the PCSK9 gene created by genetic engineering or gene editing.

label: long QT syndrome, KCNQ1-related, rabbit
definition: Any heart disorder characterized by pathologically prolonged ventricular action potential duration that occurs in rabbits due to a mutation in the KCNQ1 gene created by genetic engineering or gene editing.

label: long QT syndrome, KCNH2-related, rabbit
definition: Any heart disorder characterized by pathologically prolonged ventricular action potential duration with sudden cardiac death due to polymorphic vetricular tachycardia that occurs in rabbits due to a mutation in the KCNH2 gene created by genetic engineering or gene editing.

label: long QT syndrome, KCNE1-related, rabbit
definition: Any heart disorder characterized by pathologically prolonged ventricular action potential duration that occurs in rabbits due to a mutation in the KCNE1 gene created by genetic engineering or gene editing.

label: ichthyosis, ABHD5-related, dog
definition: Ichthyosis that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the ABHD5 gene.

label: motor neuron disease, TMCO6-related, sheep
definition: Motor neuron disease that occurs in sheep due to a mutation in the TMCO6 gene.

label: microcephaly, MFSD2A-related, sheep
definition: Microcephaly that occurs in sheep due to a mutation in the MFSD2A gene.

label: ichthyosis, KRT1-related, dog
definition: Ichthyosis that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the KRT1 gene.

label: hydrallantois, SLC12A1-related, cattle
definition: Hydrallantois that occurs in cattle due to a mutation in the SLC12A1 gene.

label: ichthyosis, FA2H-related, cattle
definition: Ichthyosis that occurs in cattle due to a mutation in the FA2H gene.

label: hair shaft dysplasia, DSG4-related, domestic cat
definition: A disorder characterized by bulbous swellings of the hair shafts and hypotrichosis that occurs in cats due to a mutation in the DSG4 gene.

label: hypoparathyroidism, RAPGEF5-related, horse
definition: Hypoparathyroidism that occurs in horses due to a mutation in the RAPGEF5 gene. Affected foals present with hypocalcemia, tetany and seizures.

label: muscular dystrophy-dystroglycanopathy, LARGE1-related, dog
definition: Any muscular dystrophy due to abnormal glycosylation of α-dystroglycan that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the LARGE1 gene.

label: Lewy body-like disease, CADPS2-related, yellow-crowned parrot
definition: A neurodegenerative disease characterized by severe ataxia, rigidity, and tremor with neuronal loss, spongiosis, and widespread Lewy body-like inclusions in many regions of the brain including the midbrain, basal ganglia, and neocortex that occurs in yellow-crowned parrot due to a mutation in the CADPS2 gene.

label: lysosomal storage disease, CNP-related, dog
definition: Any lysosomal storage disease that occurs in dogs due to a mutation in the CNP gene.

label: hyperbilirubinemia, non-human animal
definition: Hyperbilirubinemia that occurs in non-human animals.

label: hyperlipidemia, non-human animal
definition: Hyperlipidemia that occurs in non-human animals.

label: hyperkeratosis, non-human animal
definition: Hyperkeratosis that occurs in non-human animals.

definition: Congenital hypotrichosis that occurs in non-human animals.

definition: Ichthyosis that occurs in dogs.

definition: Inborn errors of metabolism that occur in non-human animals.

definition: Mucolipidosis that occurs in non-human animals.

definition: Anemia that occurs in non-human animals.
